inclusion.criterion: all children referred with abdominal pain
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: to one surgeon on the pediatric general surgery service at the Health Sciences Centre (HSC)-Children's Hospital in Winnipeg.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: children with abdominal pain due to other surgical or medical conditions
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 45-year-old woman with abdominal pain, nausea and vomiting. Similar pain in the past year. Hypercholesterolemia and C/sections.
